name: Missing images in CVP
description: Images are configured in CVP but aren't being loaded by the image service.

scan.details: Checks if required images weren't loaded.
steps: Check if there are images that need to be added.
Check if the image service wasn't able to find the images.
Check if the image service wasn't able to add those missing images

patch.details: No patch is available. The TAC engineer handling the issue should the provided internal links for instructions on fixing it.
